import { StyledButton, StyledContent } from '../style/collapsible.styled' import { useState } from 'react' export const Collapsible = ({ children, name }) => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) return (

{name}

setIsOpen(!isOpen)}> Les mer
{children}
) }
